title: Switzerland to host 2027 world summit on artificial intelligence
description: Switzerland will host the next World Summit on Artificial Intelligence in Geneva in 2027, President Guy Parmelin announced on Thursday in New Delhi during the 2026 AI Summit.

title: Bill Gates Cancels AI Summit Keynote Amid Epstein Allegations - Reports
description: US billionaire and Microsoft founder Bill Gates has canceled his keynote speech at an artificial intelligence summit in India amid allegations of ties to infamous late financier Jeffrey Epstein, CNN reported on Thursday, citing a statement from the Gates' foundation.

title: Sam Altman, At Delhi Summit, Shares One Thing He Agrees With Others On AI
description: If there is one consensus from the massively successful India AI Impact Summit 2026 held in Delhi, it would be the call for regulation of artificial intelligence. The latest to endorse this view is ChatGPT-maker OpenAI's chief Sam Altman.
content:

title: India bets big on data centres in AI race. Where will the massive amounts of water come from?
description: Like many things about artificial intelligence, no one really knows how thirsty it can get. Data centres can guzzle up to 18 lakh litres of water a day. What does that spell for a country where taps already run dry in most major cities?
content:
Newton County in Georgia, US, and Tusyana in Uttar Pradesh’s Greater Noida have nothing in common, except that they have both seen the future – the effects artificial intelligence (AI) data centres have on water.

title: Reliance Chairman Mukesh Ambani: AI won’t eliminate jobs, announces Rs 10 lakh crore investment in India AI Impact Summit Delhi
description: At the India AI Impact Summit 2026, Mukesh Ambani, Chairman of Reliance Industries, emphasized that artificial intelligence will create opportunities rather than eliminate jobs, while unveiling a $110 billion plan to build cutting-edge AI infrastructure across India.

title: Meta AI already helping solve healthcare, farming and accessibility gaps in India, says Chief AI Officer
description: Meta's artificial intelligence tools are actively benefiting India. These AI applications are improving cancer diagnostics and crop health. They are also enhancing accessibility for people with disabilities and supporting India's linguistic diversity through advanced translation models. Meta emphasizes responsible AI development, highlighting its commitment to safety and user trust as it drives innovation across the nation.

title: India among Microsoft's largest AI investment destinations: Brad Smith
description: New Delhi, Feb 19 (PTI) India is one of the largest investment destinations for Microsoft as the company has announced plans to invest USD 50 billion by the end of this decade to expand artificial intelligence (AI) across the Global South, Microsoft Vice-Chairman and President Brad Smith said on Thursday. title: V-P hails Modi speech at AI Summit, says he laid down India's vision, responsible approach to AI
description: New Delhi, Feb 19 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s address at the India AI Impact Summit here reflects the country’s visionary and responsible approach to Artificial Intelligence, Vice-President C P Radhakrishnan said on Thursday.
